canvas:CanvasModel.name: 01. Waarom deze uitwerking.
canvas:CanvasModel.documentation:
Voor het antwoord op de vraag "Waarom deze uitwerking" heb ik voor mijzelf een BMC ingevuld. Dit Canvas helpt mij om focus te houden op de juiste dingen voor de juiste doelgroep(en).
For more information visit http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com
This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
canvas:CanvasModel.hintContent:
The Business Model Canvas is a strategic management and entrepreneurial tool. It allows you to describe, design, challenge, invent, and pivot your business model.

For more information visit http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com

This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

children.hintContent:
• Who are our Key Partners?
  • Who are our Key Suppliers?
  • Which Key Resources are we acquiring from partners?
  • Which Key Activities do partners perform?

    • Motivations for partnerships:
  • Optimization and economy
  • Reduction of risk and uncertainty
  • Acquisition of particular resources and activities

children.notes: Vooralsnog is het onderhouden van deze plek een volledig persoonlijk ding.

children.hintContent:
• What Key Activities do our Value Propositions require?
  • Our Distribution Channels?
  • Customer Relationships?
  • Revenue Streams?

    • Categories:

  • Production
  • Problem Solving
  • Platform/Network
    •

children.notes: Via deze plek probeer ik meer inzicht te realiseren in het gezondheidsinformatiestelsel.
Via deze plek probeer ik zo veel mogelijk onderwerpen over digitalisereing en gegevensuitwisseling inzichtelijk te maken vanuit de GGZ als hoofdonderwerp.

children.content: Inzichtelijk maken van het werken onder architectuur
children.notes: Via deze plek probeer ik zo veel mogelijk kennis vast te legen over werken onder architectuur.

children.hintContent:
• What Key Resources do our Value Propositions require?
  • Our Distribution Channels?
  • Customer Relationships?
  • Revenue Streams?

    • Types of resources:

  • Physical
  • Intellectual (brand patents, copyrights, data)
  • Human
  • Financial

children.notes: Om deze kennisbank te kunnen vullen heb ik flink wat bronnen nodig. Bij ieder los onderwerp vermeld ik nu al de bron - wellicht zal ik hier ook nog een lijstje toevoegen.
Via deze plek kan ik samenhang realiseren tussen onderwerpen die elders nergens beschreven is.
Via deze omgevinging kan ik nieuwe vraagstukken zoals use cases uitwerken en linken aan allerlei relevante objecten.
Deze plek vormt een persoonlijke kennisbank waar ik belangrijke informatie snel voorhanden heb.

children.hintContent:
• What type of relationship does each of our Customer
  • Segments expect us to establish and maintain with them?
  • Which ones have we established?
  • How are they integrated with the rest of our business model?
  • How costly are they?

    • Examples:

  • Personal assistance
  • Dedicated Personal Assistance
  • Self-Service
  • Automated Services
  • Communities
  • Co-creation

children.notes: Omdat ik de enige gebruiker ben.

children.hintContent:
• Through which Channels do our Customer Segments want to be reached?
  • How are we reaching them now?
  • How are our Channels integrated?
  • Which ones work best?
  • Which ones are most cost-efficient?
  • How are we integrating them with customer routines?

    • Channel phases:

    1. Awareness.
    How do we raise awareness about our company’s products and services?

    2. Evaluation.
    How do we help customers evaluate our organization’s Value Proposition?

    3. Purchase.
    How do we allow customers to purchase specific products and services?

    4. Delivery.
    How do we deliver a Value Proposition to customers?

    5. After sales.
    How do we provide post-purchase customer support?

children.notes:
Via Github heb ik vanaf ieder systeem snel toegang tot deze plek.
https://mpcs75.github.io/archi-model-ea/?view=id-7baa2e9bbeeb44e587ed02251e5b4d3e

children.hintContent:
• For whom are we creating value?
  • Who are our most important customers?

  • Mass Market
  • Niche Market
  • Segmented
  • Diversified
  • Multi-sided Platform

• What are the most important costs inherent in our business model?
  • Which Key Resources are most expensive?
  • Which Key Activities are most expensive?

    Is your business more:
  • Cost Driven (leanest cost structure, low price value proposition, maximum automation, extensive outsourcing)
  • Value Driven ( focused on value creation, premium value proposition)
    •

    Sample Characteristics:
  • Fixed Costs (salaries, rents, utilities)
  • Variable costs
  • Economies of scale
  • Economies of scope

children.name: Block
children.hintContent:
• For what value are our customers really willing to pay?
  • For what do they currently pay?
  • How are they currently paying?
  • How would they prefer to pay?
  • How much does each Revenue Stream contribute to overall revenues?

    • Types:

  • Asset sale
  • Usage fee
  • Subscription Fees
  • Lending/Renting/Leasing
  • Licensing
  • Brokerage fees
  • Advertising
    •

    Fixed Pricing:

  • List Price
  • Product feature dependent
  • Customer segment dependent
  • Volume dependent
    •

    Dynamic Pricing:

  • Negotiation( bargaining)
  • Yield Management
  • Real-time-Market
    •

children.notes: Via deze plek kan ik door het vergaren van informatie beter adviseren bij architectuurvraagstukken.
Door beter architectuur advies worden eigenaren van vraagstukken beter geinformeerd waardoor besluiten weloverwogen genomen kunnen worden.
